category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_web_search_in_unit_system
preference.preference_description: Specifies the unit system when searching for classification objects (ICOs) in the Classification thin client application. Valid Values: metric - Search in the metric system only. non-metric - Search in the nonmetric system only. both - Search in both the metric and nonmetric systems, with switching enabled in the Query tab.
